text:
Kiril Petrov Domuschiev (; born 18 April 1969) is a Bulgarian businessman. He is the owner of football club PFC Ludogorets Razgrad. In 2003, he co-founded Advance Properties. In April 2019, Advance Properties bought Nova Television, the largest media group in Bulgaria. He was born in Sofia.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Domuschiev tested positive for COVID-19.
